titleStmt.title: Partial Manuscripts Schema, constrained for usage in XForms
titleStmt.author: Maximilian de Molière
Nathan Gibson

publicationStmt.authority: Institut für den Nahen und Mittleren Osten
publicationStmt.publisher: ERC-funded project: MAJLIS. The Transformation of Jewish Literature in Arabic in the Islamicate World

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

revisionDesc.change: Created schema on basis of Arabic Manuscripts Schema created by Pietro Liuzzo

div.head: Information on this customization
div.p: Schema for MAJLIS Project. This part of the schema is used for entering descriptions of the manuscript support using XForms.
Built on the Beta maṣāḥǝft Guidelines contain examples and details of that customization.
Added Rules from the consolidated schema of FIRHIST
Constrained this schema for generating forms.

moduleRef.include: bible citedRange item list ptr quote title
persName listPerson person addName forename birth placeName death floruit sex faith occupation residence

elementSpec.desc: You have two options: 1) Create "Additional name" fields for every name component, like ism, kunya, etc., 2) you enter the full name form into the "Full name" field. Reference items from the bibliography in the "Source" field.
Enter name elements like kunya or patronym that do not fit the mold of forenames and surnames. Choose the name type from the dropdown list.
Give the person's given name.
Write out the full form of a person's name.
Provide the date and place of birth in the fields below.
Fill in the date in CE. Reference items from the bibliography in the "Source" field.
Provide the date and place of death in the fields below.
Specify the denomination of the person. Reference items from the bibliography in the "Source" field.
Fill in the date of the period of intellectual activity.
Enter persistent identifiers of external projects for the same person and choose the source from the list.

Describe the person's profession, i.e. what job did they perform to earn a living? This is NOT the role the person played with regard to the manuscripts. Reference items from the bibliography in the "Source" field.

Look up the place records. Try different spellings in different languages! If no suitable record exists, create a new one. The place given here refers to the acquisition (and not the production of the copy). Reference items from the bibliography in the "Source" field.
Choose the roles the person fulfilled from the list. Create as many fields as necessary.
Create as many role fields as necessary.
Enter the information where the person lived in the field below.
Choose the gender of the person from the list. Reference items from the bibliography in the "Source" field.
Add a bibliographic item and specify whether it is a manuscript or not.
The title to the Zotero will be filled out automatically.
The link to the Zotero will be filled out automatically.
Specify which pages, columns, etc. you are refering to.
Describe the document and give a transcription.
Transcribe relevant portion of the text. Specify language and script of the document.
Add your observations on the person.
